name: L-2-aminoadipate-6-semialdehyde:NADP+ 6-oxidoreductase
definition: alpha-Aminoadipoyl-S-acyl enzyme + NADPH + H+ <=> L-2-Aminoadipate 6-semialdehyde + Holo-Lys2 + NADP+
comment: The last step of three step reaction (R03098 + R04863 + R04390) For reverse direction, one-step reaction (see R03103)
